alert.note: Alert for Appanoose; Davis (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 3:23PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Davis and southern Appanoose Counties through 400 PM CDT... At 323 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Bloomfield to 9 miles north of Unionville. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail and additional rainfall up to one inch. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Ponding of ponding of water on roadways, low visibilities, and rises in small streams and creeks. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Bloomfield around 335 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
